tasks.name: Design multi-tenant database architecture with product catalog schema
tasks.description: Create a scalable database schema supporting multiple tenants with product tables, categories, variants, pricing, and inventory. Include indexing strategy for sub-2-second query performance and data isolation mechanisms between tenants. Document entity relationships and migration scripts.

subtasks.name: Design multi-tenant data isolation strategy and core schema
subtasks.description: Define tenant isolation approach (schema-per-tenant vs row-level security), create base tables for tenants, products, categories, and establish primary/foreign key relationships. Document isolation trade-offs and security considerations.

subtasks.name: Create product catalog tables with variants and pricing
subtasks.description: Design and implement tables for product variants, SKUs, pricing tiers, currency support, and promotional pricing. Include constraints for data integrity and relationships between products, variants, and pricing records.

subtasks.name: Implement inventory management schema
subtasks.description: Create inventory tracking tables including stock levels, warehouse locations, stock reservations, and inventory history/audit logs. Define relationships between inventory and product variants.

subtasks.name: Design and implement comprehensive indexing strategy
subtasks.description: Create indexes on frequently queried columns (tenant_id, product_id, category_id, SKU) with query execution plans. Document index strategy for sub-2-second query performance, including composite indexes and covering indexes. Test query performance.

subtasks.name: Create database migration scripts and versioning system
subtasks.description: Write migration scripts for schema creation, data seeding, and version control. Include rollback procedures, tenant-specific migration handling, and documentation for deployment process.

subtasks.name: Document entity relationships and create ER diagram
subtasks.description: Generate comprehensive ER diagram showing all tables, relationships, cardinality, and constraints. Document business rules, data validation rules, and relationship explanations. Include data dictionary with column definitions.

subtasks.name: Test multi-tenant isolation and performance validation
subtasks.description: Execute test queries across multiple tenants to verify data isolation, run performance benchmarks against sub-2-second SLA, test concurrent access patterns, and document results with optimization recommendations.

tasks.name: Implement version control workflow and establish coding standards
tasks.description: Initialize Git repository with branching strategy (main, develop, feature branches), create comprehensive coding standards document covering naming conventions, code structure, and review processes. Configure pre-commit hooks for linting and formatting.

tasks.name: Build responsive product catalog with search and filtering capabilities
tasks.description: Develop front-end product browsing interface with category navigation, full-text search, faceted filtering, and sorting options. Implement lazy loading and image optimization for mobile-first experience with progressive web app capabilities including offline product viewing.

subtasks.name: Set up project structure and PWA configuration
subtasks.description: Initialize front-end project with PWA capabilities including service worker setup, manifest.json configuration, offline storage strategy, and mobile-first responsive design framework. Configure build tools for asset optimization.

subtasks.name: Implement product data model and API integration
subtasks.description: Create TypeScript/JavaScript models for product data structure. Build API service layer to fetch products with pagination support. Implement state management (Redux/Context API) to store and manage product catalog data.

subtasks.name: Build category navigation and layout components
subtasks.description: Create responsive category sidebar/navigation component. Implement product grid/list layout with responsive breakpoints. Build header navigation with search bar placeholder. Ensure mobile-first design with collapsible menus.

subtasks.name: Develop full-text search functionality
subtasks.description: Implement search input component with debouncing. Create search query logic to filter products by name, description, and SKU. Add search result highlighting and 'no results' state handling. Integrate with state management.

subtasks.name: Create faceted filtering system
subtasks.description: Build filter UI components for price range, ratings, availability, and product attributes. Implement filter logic to combine multiple filters with AND/OR operations. Add filter state management and 'clear filters' functionality. Display active filter badges.

subtasks.name: Implement sorting and lazy loading
subtasks.description: Create sorting dropdown (price, popularity, newest, rating). Implement infinite scroll or 'load more' pagination. Set up intersection observer for lazy loading product items. Optimize performance with virtualization for large lists.

subtasks.name: Optimize images and implement offline product viewing
subtasks.description: Set up image lazy loading with placeholder/blur-up effect. Implement responsive image srcset for different screen sizes. Cache product data and images in service worker for offline access. Add offline indicator UI. Test offline functionality.

tasks.name: Develop shopping cart with real-time inventory validation
tasks.description: Create shopping cart functionality with session management, quantity updates, and real-time inventory checks to prevent overselling. Implement cart persistence across sessions and devices with automatic price recalculation and stock availability notifications.

subtasks.name: Design and implement cart data model and session management
subtasks.description: Create database schema for shopping carts, cart items, and session storage. Implement session management system to track user carts across sessions and devices. Set up cart initialization, retrieval, and basic CRUD operations for cart items.

subtasks.name: Build real-time inventory validation system
subtasks.description: Develop inventory checking logic that validates product availability and quantity limits before adding/updating items in cart. Implement stock level queries, overselling prevention mechanisms, and error handling for out-of-stock scenarios.

subtasks.name: Create cart API endpoints and quantity update functionality
subtasks.description: Build REST/GraphQL endpoints for add-to-cart, remove-from-cart, update-quantity, and get-cart operations. Implement request validation, quantity modification logic with inventory re-validation, and proper error responses.

subtasks.name: Implement automatic price recalculation and discount logic
subtasks.description: Develop price calculation engine that recalculates totals when items are added/removed/updated. Integrate discount application, tax calculation, and shipping cost computation. Ensure prices update in real-time based on current product pricing.

subtasks.name: Build stock availability notifications system
subtasks.description: Create notification mechanism to alert users when items are low in stock, out of stock, or price changes occur. Implement real-time updates using WebSockets or polling, and display notifications in the UI.

subtasks.name: Implement cart persistence across devices and sessions
subtasks.description: Set up mechanisms to sync cart data across multiple devices for logged-in users. Implement local storage for guest users and migration logic when guests convert to registered users. Handle session expiration and cart recovery.

subtasks.name: Test, optimize, and integrate with checkout flow
subtasks.description: Perform end-to-end testing of all cart functionality including edge cases (overselling attempts, concurrent updates, device sync). Optimize database queries and API response times. Integrate cart system with checkout process and verify data consistency.

tasks.name: Integrate PCI-compliant payment gateway with multi-provider fallback
tasks.description: Implement secure payment processing with primary and fallback payment providers (Stripe, PayPal) including tokenization, 3D Secure authentication, and webhook handling. Configure automatic failover logic and transaction retry mechanisms to minimize payment failures.

subtasks.name: Set up Stripe and PayPal SDK integration
subtasks.description: Install and configure Stripe and PayPal SDKs in the project. Set up API credentials, environment variables, and initialize both payment provider clients. Create abstraction layer/interface for payment provider operations to enable easy switching between providers.

subtasks.name: Implement payment tokenization and secure card storage
subtasks.description: Implement PCI-compliant tokenization for both Stripe and PayPal. Create backend endpoints to securely handle card data, generate tokens, and store payment method references. Ensure no raw card data is stored locally. Set up encrypted token storage in database.

subtasks.name: Implement 3D Secure authentication flow
subtasks.description: Integrate 3D Secure (3DS) authentication for both payment providers. Implement challenge flow handling, customer verification, and response processing. Create frontend components for authentication prompts and backend logic to validate 3DS results before transaction completion.

subtasks.name: Build automatic failover and retry logic
subtasks.description: Develop failover mechanism that automatically routes failed transactions to secondary provider (PayPal if Stripe fails, vice versa). Implement exponential backoff retry logic with configurable retry attempts and delays. Create transaction state management to track retry history and prevent duplicate charges.

subtasks.name: Implement webhook handlers for payment events
subtasks.description: Create secure webhook endpoints for both Stripe and PayPal payment events (success, failure, refund, dispute). Implement signature verification for webhook authenticity. Build event processing logic to update order status, trigger confirmations, and handle edge cases like duplicate webhooks.

subtasks.name: Create payment processing API and transaction logging
subtasks.description: Build REST API endpoints for initiating payments, checking transaction status, and handling refunds. Implement comprehensive transaction logging with audit trails for compliance. Create database schema for storing transaction records, payment attempts, and provider responses.

subtasks.name: Test, document, and deploy payment system
subtasks.description: Perform end-to-end testing with both providers in sandbox/test mode. Test failover scenarios, retry logic, webhook handling, and 3DS flows. Create API documentation and deployment guides. Set up monitoring and alerting for payment failures. Deploy to production with gradual rollout.

issues: Task should start with an action verb (e.g., Create, Design, Implement)
Task scope seems too large (>40h). Consider breaking it down.

tasks.name: Create bidirectional CRM integration with real-time inventory synchronization
tasks.description: Build API connectors for existing CRM system enabling real-time inventory updates, customer data synchronization, and order status tracking. Implement event-driven architecture with message queues for reliable data consistency and conflict resolution strategies.

subtasks.name: Design CRM API Integration Architecture
subtasks.description: Design the bidirectional API connector architecture including authentication methods, endpoint specifications, data mapping schemas for customer data and inventory, and rate limiting strategy. Document API contracts and integration patterns for the existing CRM system.

subtasks.name: Implement Event-Driven Message Queue System
subtasks.description: Set up message queue infrastructure (RabbitMQ, Kafka, or similar) with producer/consumer patterns. Configure topics/queues for inventory updates, customer data changes, and order status events. Implement message serialization, error handling, and dead-letter queue mechanisms.

subtasks.name: Build CRM API Connector and Authentication
subtasks.description: Develop API client library for CRM system integration including OAuth/API key authentication, request/response handling, retry logic, and error management. Implement connection pooling and health check mechanisms for reliable connectivity.

subtasks.name: Implement Real-Time Inventory Synchronization
subtasks.description: Create bidirectional inventory sync service that publishes inventory changes to message queue and consumes CRM inventory updates. Implement data transformation, validation, and mapping between CRM and e-commerce inventory schemas.

subtasks.name: Develop Customer Data Synchronization Service
subtasks.description: Build service to synchronize customer profiles, contact information, and preferences between CRM and e-commerce platform. Implement two-way sync with change detection, field mapping, and handling of customer creation/updates/deletions.

subtasks.name: Create Order Status Tracking and Conflict Resolution
subtasks.description: Implement order status event publishing to message queue and CRM updates. Build conflict resolution strategy for handling data inconsistencies (last-write-wins, priority-based, or manual review). Add logging and monitoring for conflict detection.

subtasks.name: Test, Monitor, and Deploy Integration
subtasks.description: Write integration tests covering all sync scenarios, edge cases, and failure modes. Set up monitoring/alerting for queue health, sync failures, and data inconsistencies. Perform end-to-end testing and deploy to production with rollback plan.

tasks.name: Build admin dashboard for inventory and order management
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive admin interface for product CRUD operations, bulk inventory updates, order processing, and customer management. Include role-based access control, audit logging, and batch import/export functionality for efficient inventory management.

subtasks.name: Set up admin dashboard UI framework and navigation
subtasks.description: Create the base admin dashboard layout with responsive navigation, sidebar menu structure, and main content area. Implement routing for different admin sections (products, orders, customers, settings). Set up authentication check to ensure only admins can access the dashboard.

subtasks.name: Implement product CRUD operations
subtasks.description: Build create, read, update, and delete functionality for products. Include forms for product details (name, description, price, SKU, images), product listing table with search/filter/sort, detail view, and edit forms. Add form validation and error handling.

subtasks.name: Develop role-based access control (RBAC) system
subtasks.description: Create user roles (admin, manager, staff) with permission levels. Implement middleware to check permissions before allowing access to specific features. Add role assignment interface for admins to manage user roles. Restrict CRUD operations based on user permissions.

subtasks.name: Build bulk inventory management and batch operations
subtasks.description: Create bulk update interface for inventory quantities. Implement CSV/Excel import functionality to update multiple products at once. Add batch operations UI (select multiple items, apply actions). Include validation and preview before applying bulk changes.

subtasks.name: Create order processing and management interface
subtasks.description: Build order listing with status filters (pending, processing, shipped, delivered). Implement order detail view showing customer info, items, and shipping details. Add order status update functionality, order notes, and order actions (cancel, refund, resend confirmation).

subtasks.name: Implement customer management and audit logging
subtasks.description: Build customer list with search and filters. Create customer detail view with order history and account info. Implement audit logging system to track all admin actions (who changed what, when, why). Create audit log viewer with filters and export capability.

subtasks.name: Add batch import/export functionality and finalize
subtasks.description: Implement export features for products, orders, and customers to CSV/Excel formats. Create import templates and validation. Build scheduled export options. Add data backup functionality. Perform integration testing across all admin features and optimize performance.

issues: Task contains vague terms that should be more specific
Task scope seems too large (>40h). Consider breaking it down.

tasks.name: Implement comprehensive analytics and business intelligence tracking
tasks.description: Integrate analytics platform tracking customer behavior, conversion funnels, cart abandonment, sales patterns, and inventory turnover metrics. Create customizable dashboards with real-time reporting and automated alerts for key business metrics and stock thresholds.

subtasks.name: Set up analytics platform infrastructure and event tracking
subtasks.description: Select and integrate an analytics platform (e.g., Google Analytics 4, Mixpanel, or custom solution). Implement event tracking for customer behavior including page views, product views, add-to-cart, remove-from-cart, and checkout initiation events. Configure user identification and session tracking.

subtasks.name: Implement conversion funnel and cart abandonment tracking
subtasks.description: Create tracking logic for conversion funnel stages (product view → add to cart → checkout → payment → order completion). Implement cart abandonment detection and capture abandonment events with cart contents and user data. Set up recovery event triggers.

subtasks.name: Build sales patterns and inventory turnover data collection
subtasks.description: Implement backend data collection for sales metrics (revenue, order count, average order value, product performance). Create inventory tracking to capture stock levels, turnover rates, and product velocity. Set up data aggregation queries for time-based analysis (daily, weekly, monthly patterns).

subtasks.name: Create customizable dashboard UI with real-time data visualization
subtasks.description: Design and develop dashboard interface with configurable widgets and charts. Implement real-time data updates using WebSockets or polling. Include visualizations for conversion funnels, sales trends, inventory levels, and customer behavior metrics. Add drag-and-drop widget customization.

subtasks.name: Implement automated alerts and threshold notifications
subtasks.description: Create alert system for key business metrics (low stock thresholds, high cart abandonment rates, sales anomalies). Build notification delivery (email, in-app, SMS) with configurable thresholds and alert rules. Implement alert management interface for users to customize alert settings.

subtasks.name: Build backend reporting API and data aggregation engine
subtasks.description: Develop REST/GraphQL API endpoints for dashboard data retrieval. Create data aggregation and transformation logic to compute metrics from raw events. Implement caching strategies for performance optimization. Add filtering and date range parameters for flexible reporting.

subtasks.name: Test analytics pipeline and optimize performance
subtasks.description: Perform end-to-end testing of event tracking, data collection, and reporting accuracy. Test dashboard responsiveness and real-time updates under load. Optimize database queries and API response times. Validate alert triggering and notification delivery. Document analytics implementation.

tasks.name: Establish CI/CD pipeline with automated testing and deployment
tasks.description: Configure continuous integration and deployment pipeline using GitHub Actions or Jenkins with automated unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests. Include staging environment deployment, performance testing gates, and blue-green production deployment strategy.

subtasks.name: Set up CI/CD platform and repository configuration
subtasks.description: Choose between GitHub Actions or Jenkins and configure the CI/CD platform. Set up webhook integration with the repository, configure build triggers on push/pull requests, and establish environment variables for staging and production. Create initial pipeline YAML/Jenkinsfile structure.

subtasks.name: Implement automated unit and integration test suite
subtasks.description: Set up test framework (Jest, Pytest, or similar), write unit tests for core e-commerce functions (product catalog, shopping cart, checkout), configure integration tests for API endpoints and database interactions. Configure test coverage reporting and set minimum coverage thresholds (e.g., 80%).

subtasks.name: Configure automated end-to-end testing
subtasks.description: Set up E2E testing framework (Cypress, Selenium, or Playwright), create test scenarios for critical user journeys (product search, add to cart, checkout flow). Configure headless browser execution in CI/CD pipeline and establish test result reporting.

subtasks.name: Set up staging environment deployment pipeline
subtasks.description: Configure automated deployment to staging environment on successful test passes. Set up environment-specific configurations, database migrations, and seed data. Implement deployment notifications and rollback procedures for staging.

subtasks.name: Implement performance testing gates
subtasks.description: Integrate performance testing tools (Lighthouse, k6, or JMeter) into the pipeline. Define performance benchmarks for page load times, API response times, and resource utilization. Configure pipeline to fail if performance thresholds are exceeded and generate performance reports.

subtasks.name: Configure blue-green production deployment strategy
subtasks.description: Implement blue-green deployment infrastructure with load balancer configuration. Set up automated traffic switching between blue and green environments, health checks for production instances, and automated rollback triggers on health check failures.

subtasks.name: Create monitoring, logging, and pipeline documentation
subtasks.description: Set up CI/CD pipeline monitoring and alerting for build failures. Configure centralized logging for all pipeline stages. Create comprehensive documentation including pipeline architecture diagrams, runbooks for common issues, deployment procedures, and rollback guidelines.

issues: Task should start with an action verb (e.g., Create, Design, Implement)

tasks.name: Conduct load testing and performance optimization for concurrent users
tasks.description: Execute load testing simulating concurrent user scenarios to validate sub-2-second page load times and system scalability. Identify and resolve bottlenecks through database query optimization, caching implementation, CDN configuration, and API response time improvements.

subtasks.name: Set up load testing environment and tools
subtasks.description: Configure load testing infrastructure with Apache JMeter or Locust. Set up test scenarios simulating 100, 500, and 1000 concurrent users accessing product catalog, shopping cart, and checkout pages. Define baseline metrics and establish monitoring dashboards for CPU, memory, database connections, and response times.

subtasks.name: Execute load tests and identify performance bottlenecks
subtasks.description: Run load testing simulations across all three concurrent user scenarios. Capture detailed metrics including page load times, API response times, database query execution times, and error rates. Document bottlenecks by component (frontend, API, database) and generate performance reports with waterfall analysis.

subtasks.name: Optimize database queries and implement indexing
subtasks.description: Analyze slow query logs from load tests. Optimize N+1 queries, add missing database indexes on product catalog and cart queries, implement query result pagination, and refactor complex joins. Validate improvements through re-running targeted load tests on database-heavy operations.

subtasks.name: Implement caching strategy (Redis/Memcached)
subtasks.description: Set up Redis or Memcached for caching product catalog data, user sessions, and cart contents. Implement cache invalidation strategies for product updates. Configure appropriate TTLs for different data types. Test cache hit rates and measure latency improvements for repeated requests.

subtasks.name: Configure CDN and optimize static assets
subtasks.description: Set up CDN (CloudFront, Cloudflare, or similar) for static assets (images, CSS, JavaScript). Implement asset compression, minification, and versioning. Configure cache headers and browser caching policies. Verify CDN edge location performance and measure reduction in time-to-first-byte.

subtasks.name: Optimize API response times and implement pagination
subtasks.description: Review API endpoints for inefficiencies. Implement response pagination for product listings and order history. Add API response caching headers. Optimize JSON payload sizes through field selection and compression. Implement rate limiting and connection pooling. Measure API response time improvements.

subtasks.name: Validate optimization results and performance benchmarking
subtasks.description: Re-run full load tests with all optimizations applied across 100, 500, and 1000 concurrent users. Verify sub-2-second page load times are achieved. Compare before/after metrics, document performance gains by optimization type, and create performance baseline documentation for future regression testing.

issues: Task should start with an action verb (e.g., Create, Design, Implement)
